formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
Name of the configuration to be used. URL and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.
A Configuration defines connection details and can be created by going to plugin configuration page.

formElement.label: Data Source Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the Data Source. This will also serve as the unique identifier for this resource. For example MysqlXADS.

formElement.label: Profile:
formElement.documentation: Required for Domain, will be ignored for Standalone. Name of the Server Profile to which this XA Data Source applies to. For example: 'full', 'full-ha'
